sentences.sContent: So should a respectable bourse be offering the stock?
sentences.sContent_eng: So should a respectable bourse be offering the stock?
sentences.sCn: 那么，一家可敬的交易所应该发行这只股票吗？

sentences.sContent: You can open countless capital account in different bourse.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can open countless capital account in different bourse.
sentences.sCn: 你可以在不同的交易所开设无数个资金账户。

sentences.sContent: The paris of the restoration at the bourse: a very white colonnade supporting a very smooth frieze ; the whole is square and cost twenty millions.
sentences.sContent_eng: The paris of the restoration at the bourse: a very white colonnade supporting a very smooth frieze ; the whole is square and cost twenty millions.
sentences.sCn: 在交易所广场，是复辟时期的巴黎，雪白的列柱支撑着柱顶盘的光滑中楣，整体呈正方形，造价两千万。

trans.tranOther: The bourse of a European city or region is its stock exchange
